verses.name: Genesis 14:5
verses.text: And in the fourteenth year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the Rephaims in Ashteroth Karnaim, and the Zuzims in Ham, and the Emims in Shaveh Kiriathaim,

verses.name: Genesis 14:6
verses.text: And the Horites in their mount Seir, unto El–paran, which is by the wilderness.

verses.name: Genesis 14:7
verses.text: And they returned, and came to En–mishpat, which is Kadesh, and smote all the country of the Amalekites, and also the Amorites, that dwelt in Hazezon–tamar.
